dcterms:creator: Y. Shi
L. Cui
Z. Qi
F. Meng
Z. Chen
dcterms:description: A dataset for crack segmentation from paved road images, consisting of 118 labelled images. The dataset is split into training, validation, and testing sets for evaluating semi-supervised segmentation.
dcterms:title: CrackForest

dcterms:creator: F. Yang
L. Zhang
S. Yu
D. Prokhorov
X. Mei
H. Ling
dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset consisting of 1896 labelled road crack images for training, 348 for validation, and 1124 for testing. The dataset is used for evaluating pavement crack detection.
dcterms:title: Crack500

dcterms:creator: F. Yang
L. Zhang
S. Yu
D. Prokhorov
X. Mei
H. Ling
dcterms:description: A dataset created from a larger road crack detection dataset, consisting of 384 images manually selected and cropped to focus on smaller regions with cracks, totaling 508 annotated images.
dcterms:title: Gaps384

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
dcterms:description: A dataset proposed for automatically extracting roads from satellite images, consisting of 6880 labelled images for training, 1215 for validation, and 440 for testing.
dcterms:title: MIT Road

dcterms:creator: I. Arganda-Carreras

dcterms:description: A dataset created for evaluating segmentation on cell membranes, consisting of 30 labelled images, divided into training and testing sets.
dcterms:title: EM128

dcterms:creator: J. Staal
M. D. Abr`amoff
M. Niemeijer
M. A. Viergever
B. Van Ginneken
dcterms:description: A dataset developed for evaluating segmentation on retinal blood vessels, consisting of 20 labelled images, split into training and testing sets.
dcterms:title: DRIVE128
